mapper.insert: insert into tb_member(member_id, member_pw, member_names, member_tel) values (#{member_id},#{member_pw},#{member_name},#{member_tel})
mapper.select: select * from tb_member where member_id = #{member_id} and member_pw = #{member_pw}
select member_id from tb_member where member_names = #{member_name} and member_tel = #{member_tel}
